• Draw a card.

Whenever another creature dies, you may integrate it. (Exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it's integrated onto.)
Whenever a creature card is integrated onto Unmolded One, you may have it become a copy of that card until end of turn, except it has Unmolded One's abilities.

—General Diadem, Usurper
